<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/answerComponents/{answerComponentId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves an answer component by its ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Answer component ID","in":"path","name":"answerComponentId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Answer component data","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}},"404":{"description":"Answer component not found","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"properties":{"code":{"enum":["server","user","not-found","db","vector-db","external"],"type":"string","x-enum-comments":{"CodeDB":"Database errors","CodeExternal":"External service errors, HTTP 502","CodeNotFound":"Resource not found, HTTP 404","CodeServer":"Internal server errors, HTTP 5xx","CodeUser":"User errors, HTTP 4xx","CodeVectorDB":"Vector database errors"},"x-enum-varnames":["CodeServer","CodeUser","CodeNotFound","CodeDB","CodeVectorDB","CodeExternal"]},"id":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
